top.title: Trump says he will take legal action against BBC over Panorama edit
top.summary: The US president confirmed he intends to sue the broadcaster for at least $1bn over the Panorama edit of a 2021 speech.

top.title: Trump rolls back tariffs on dozens of food products
top.summary: The executive order allowing products like coffee and bananas to escape tariffs comes as the Trump administration faces mounting pressure over rising prices.

top.title: US justice department investigates Epstein's alleged ties to Clinton and banks after Trump request
top.summary: Democrats are accusing Trump of using the justice department to deflect from his previous relationship with Epstein.

top.title: AI firm claims Chinese spies used its tech to automate cyber attacks
top.summary: The company claimed in a blog post this was the "first reported AI-orchestrated cyber espionage campaign".

top.title: Call of Duty is back, and it's got a battle on its hands
top.summary: The annual instalment of the massive series faces new challenges from competitor Battlefield 6.

top.title: PC gaming giant Valve unveils new console to rival Xbox and PlayStation
top.summary: The Steam Machine is a console designed to allow gamers to play PC games on their TV.

title.#text: YouTube TV, ESPN, and Disney: the latest on the blackout that’s now over
Disney and ESPN are back on YouTube TV
The best early Black Friday deals we’ve found so far on laptops, TVs, and more
